mihinthale bas nawathuma wasara kihipayaka sita kisidu nadaththuwak nomathi heyin jarajirna thathwayata pathwemin pawathina bawa maha janathawa prakasha karathi.wasara kihipayaka sita mihinthale basnawathumata sidu wi athi thathwaya pilibadawa adala ansha danuwath kalada eya itu kirimata nohaki wimen mihinthale nagaraya wetha paminena janathawa dadi asiruthawata pathwana bawa prakasha karathi.mihinthale bas nawathume wahalaya dirapath wi athi heyin warshawa pawathina awasthawaladi bhawithayata ganimata nohaki wi atha.basnawathuma athulatha jalayen piri nadaththu nokirimen ehi athalatha apadrawya piri pawathina bawin dadi durgandhayak pawathi.rathri kalaye di basnawathume widuliya nomathi kamin mathdrawya bhawitha karannagethothannak bawata pathwa athi bawa janathawa pawasathi.mihinthale basnawathuma idiripita pihita aththe lamayin 850 kata aasanna sankhyawak adhayapanaya labana mihinthale pathiraja thennakon aadarsha prathamika widyalayaasalayi.ema widyalayath basnawathumath athara dura mitara20 katath itha adu pramanayaki.basnawathuma aasannaye pihita athi wishala bogasa aasannaye walakata warsha jalaya ekathu wimath samanga mandawagurak wi atha.
